name: Sandwich Assassin
description:
An LD32 game.

STORY: You are a chef with a dark past. You've decided to rid the world of the tyranny of Kings. Armed with a few condiments and slices of bread, you head out on your quest.

DIRECTIONS: Use your mouse to navigate the menus.

When making the sandwich: Click the icons, then click on an empty spot on the sandwich to place the jelly, peanut butter, and bananas. Your goal is to minimize the number of empty spots, as they will be covered in poison at the end of the sandwich-making.

When delivering the sandwich: Press space to cut. Try to time your cuts so the tasters eat small, unpoisoned pieces so that the payload can reach the King!
